leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 天文-时间域与瞬变检测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 去噪→检测→分类→告警→调度

tools.name: TOM Toolkit Base
tools.one_line_profile: Base framework for building Target and Observation Managers (TOMs) in astronomy
tools.detailed_description: The TOM Toolkit is a framework designed to help astronomers build Target and Observation Managers (TOMs). It provides a standardized interface for managing astronomical targets, planning observations, and interfacing with various observatories and data archives.

tools.name: simsurvey
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation package for astronomical survey cadence and strategy evaluation
tools.detailed_description: Simsurvey is a python package for simulating light curves of transient events (like supernovae) based on a survey strategy (cadence, depth, etc.). It helps astronomers evaluate the efficiency of different observing strategies for detecting specific types of transients.

tools.name: ztf_sim
tools.one_line_profile: Scheduler and simulation tools for the Zwicky Transient Facility (ZTF)
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the scheduling algorithms and simulation tools used for the Zwicky Transient Facility (ZTF). It allows for the planning of survey observations and the simulation of survey performance.

tools.name: QUBO-Chimera
tools.one_line_profile: Software solver for D-Wave's native QUBO problems on Chimera graph topologies
tools.detailed_description: A testbed and solver to evaluate how effectively D-Wave's native Quadratic Unconstrained Binary Optimization (QUBO) problems can be solved in software, specifically targeting the Chimera graph topology used in quantum annealers.

tools.name: MATRIX
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed data-aware execution fabric for high-performance scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: MATRIX is a distributed data-aware execution fabric supporting both high-performance computing (HPC) and many-task computing (MTC) workloads. It is designed to handle scientific workflows in fields like bioinformatics and astronomy by optimizing data locality and task scheduling.

tools.name: tilepy
tools.one_line_profile: Observation scheduling tool for tiling poorly localized transient events
tools.detailed_description: Tilepy is a tool designed for observation scheduling in poorly localized events, such as gravitational wave follow-ups. It helps determine the optimal tiling strategy to cover the probability map of the event.

tools.name: astroplan
tools.one_line_profile: Observation planning and scheduling library for astronomers
tools.detailed_description: Astroplan is an open source Python package to help astronomers plan observations. It provides tools for calculating rise/set times, moon phases, and creating observing schedules for targets at specific observatories.

tools.name: Chimera
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed observatory automation and control system
tools.detailed_description: Chimera is an observatory automation system that provides a distributed framework for controlling telescopes, cameras, and other astronomical instruments. It enables remote operation and automated observation scripts.

tools.name: ZetaPersei
tools.one_line_profile: Observation planning tools for Keck NIRC2 Polarimetry Mode
tools.detailed_description: Software tools designed for science and calibration observation planning specifically for the NIRC2 Polarimetry Mode at the Keck Observatory.

tools.name: obsplan
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for astronomical observation planning and scheduling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to assist in the planning of astronomical observations, likely providing utilities for visibility calculation, scheduling, and constraint checking.

tools.name: Tapir
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for planning astronomical observations including transit visibility and airmass plots
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to aid astronomers in planning observations, featuring capabilities for calculating transit visibility, generating airmass plots, and creating finding charts.

tools.name: RemoteObservatory
tools.one_line_profile: Control system for astronomical observatories
tools.detailed_description: A software system designed to control astronomical observatory hardware, facilitating remote operation and potentially automated observation scheduling.

tools.name: Sauron
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic observatory system for converting devices into automated telescopes
tools.detailed_description: An open source project aimed at converting phones, cameras, or telescopes into robotic observatory systems, enabling automated data acquisition for astronomy.

tools.name: obsy
tools.one_line_profile: Open Observatory Management System
tools.detailed_description: A management system for astronomical observatories, likely handling tasks such as equipment control, environmental monitoring, and observation scheduling.

tools.name: icare
tools.one_line_profile: Custom frontend and backend layer for SkyPortal for the Grandma collaboration
tools.detailed_description: A customized extension of the SkyPortal platform, providing specific features for the Grandma collaboration to manage astronomical transients and coordinate follow-up observations.

tools.name: growth-too-marshal
tools.one_line_profile: Target of Opportunity Marshal for the GROWTH collaboration
tools.detailed_description: A web-based portal (Marshal) used by the GROWTH collaboration to manage Target of Opportunity (ToO) triggers, filter transient candidates, and schedule follow-up observations.

tools.name: Tomographic-Reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Computed Tomography (CT) Reconstruction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for Computed Tomography (CT) reconstruction, implementing algorithms such as Radon transforms, filtered back projection, and Fourier methods for scientific imaging.

tools.name: OCS
tools.one_line_profile: Observatory Control System
tools.detailed_description: Software for controlling astronomical observatory equipment, likely including telescope mounts and cameras.

tools.name: ObservationTools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for planning astronomical observations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities to assist in the planning of astronomical observations, likely including visibility checks and coordinate calculations.

tools.name: pychimera
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for UCSF Chimera molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables the use of the UCSF Chimera Python API within a standard Python interpreter, facilitating automation and scripting for molecular modeling and visualization.

tools.name: asterope-scala-legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Astronomy charting and observation planning application
tools.detailed_description: Legacy Scala codebase for Asterope, an application for astronomy charting, observation planning, ephemeris calculation, and image processing.

tools.name: AstroMosaic
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based telescope planner for mosaic observations
tools.detailed_description: A web tool for visually planning astronomical observations, specifically designed for calculating coordinates for mosaic imaging.

tools.name: snex2
tools.one_line_profile: Updated Supernova Exchange built with TOM Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The Supernova Exchange platform, built using the TOM (Target and Observation Manager) Toolkit, used by the Global Supernova Project for managing supernova data and observations.

tools.name: GotoPiScope
tools.one_line_profile: Raspberry Pi-based telescope control system
tools.detailed_description: An advanced telescope control system running on Raspberry Pi, designed to automate astronomical observations and provide precision control.

tools.name: legacy_sims_featureScheduler
tools.one_line_profile: Telescope scheduler optimizing observing strategy using basis functions
tools.detailed_description: A telescope scheduling tool developed for LSST simulations that uses basis functions computed from features to optimize observing strategies.

tools.name: rubin_sim
tools.one_line_profile: Scheduler and survey strategy simulation tools for Rubin Observatory
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for the Rubin Observatory to simulate the scheduler, analyze survey strategies, and perform other related simulations to optimize observation plans.

tools.name: m4opt
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Mission Multi-Messenger Observation Planning Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for planning observations across multiple missions and messengers, facilitating the scheduling of astronomical observations.

tools.name: tom
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Observable Operator Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for learning and using Observable Operator Models (OOMs), which are used for modeling stochastic processes.

tools.name: AGFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Gene fusion annotation and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package used to annotate and visualize gene fusions, providing insights into the protein domains and functional consequences of fusion events.

tools.name: SPOT
tools.one_line_profile: Site Planning and Observation Tool for NAOJ
tools.detailed_description: A software tool used for site planning and observation scheduling, specifically developed for the National Astronomical Observatory of Japan (NAOJ).

tools.name: OpenSPIFe
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated planning and scheduling toolkit for space exploration
tools.detailed_description: The Open Scheduling and Planning Interface for Exploration (OpenSPIFe) is a toolkit developed by NASA for planning and scheduling space exploration missions.

tools.name: dorado-scheduling
tools.one_line_profile: Observation planning and scheduling simulations for Dorado
tools.detailed_description: Simulation tools for observation planning and scheduling for the Dorado mission. Note: Replaced by m4opt but remains a valid historical tool.

tools.name: yacrd
tools.one_line_profile: Chimeric read detector for long-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting chimeric reads in long-read sequencing data (PacBio, Nanopore), performing quality control and filtering.

tools.name: ChiDG
tools.one_line_profile: Chimera-based discontinuous Galerkin solver
tools.detailed_description: A discontinuous Galerkin solver built on the Chimera grid scheme, likely used for computational fluid dynamics (CFD) or similar physics simulations.

tools.name: adaptive_scheduler
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive scheduling software for astronomical observations
tools.detailed_description: A scheduling component for the Observatory Control System (OCS), designed to adaptively schedule astronomical observations.

tools.name: Cassiopee
tools.one_line_profile: CFD pre- and post-processing modules
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python modules for pre- and post-processing in Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), handling mesh manipulation and solution analysis.

tools.name: POCS
tools.one_line_profile: PANOPTES Observatory Control System
tools.detailed_description: The Observatory Control System for the PANOPTES citizen-science project, designed to automate the finding of transiting exoplanets.

tools.name: obsplanning
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for planning astronomical observations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools to assist in the planning of astronomical observations.

tools.name: observing-suite
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for planning and carrying out astronomical observations
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools built on astropy and inspired by astroplan for planning and executing astronomical observations.

tools.name: OCS
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed control system for astronomical observatories
tools.detailed_description: A distributed control system designed for astronomical observatories, used by the Simons Observatory to manage hardware and data acquisition.

tools.name: SkyPortal
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative platform for time-domain astronomy
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform for managing, visualizing, and collaborating on time-domain astronomy data, including transient detection and follow-up.

tools.name: EOSSP
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Observation Satellite Scheduling Problem solver
tools.detailed_description: A planning software for the Earth Observation Satellite Scheduling Problem (EOSSP), developed as part of a PhD thesis.

tools.name: chimeraviz
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing chimeric RNA fusions
tools.detailed_description: chimeraviz is an R package designed to automate the creation of visualizations for chimeric RNA, aiding in the analysis of gene fusions and RNA-sequencing data. It supports importing data from various fusion-finder tools and creating circle plots, cytoband plots, and other visualizations.

tools.name: VSEARCH
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput sequence analysis tool for microbiome data
tools.detailed_description: VSEARCH is a versatile open-source tool for processing metagenomic and microbiome data. It performs tasks such as sequence alignment, clustering, chimera detection, dereplication, and taxonomy assignment, designed as a free, open-source alternative to USEARCH.
